item.title: Common yarrow (*Achillea millefolium*)
item.description: Yarrow is a highly versatile perennial, particularly valuable for relieving menstrual cramps, digestive issues, colds, fevers, and for healing wounds.

item.title: Creeping thyme (*Thymus serpyllum*)
item.description: The remarkably fragrant dwarf shrub or the creeping thyme prefers growing on stony ground, and its healing effects are helpful for coughs, colds, and indigestion. Thymus serpyllum can be used to make tea, tincture, or syrup.
